2020 2 7&ensp;&#0183;&ensp;Amalgamation with Mortar box and plate amalgamation can save 70% of the gold.Amalgamation is practiced both inside and outside the 12 stamp batteries.For inside amalgamation,straight sided,copper faced,wooden chuck blocks are used.These blocks are equipped with half round iron strips,spaced 2 in.apart,for their entire length.Stamp mill17&ensp;&#0183;&ensp;A stamp mill consists of a set of heavy steel (iron shod wood in some cases) stamps,loosely held vertically in a frame,in which the stamps can slide up and down.They are lifted by cams on a horizontal rotating shaft.As the cam moves from under the stamp,the stamp falls onto the ore below,crushing the rock,and the lifting process is repeated at the next pass of the cam.
